entry.title: replace-by-fee v0.10.0rc4
entry.summary: In this email exchange, Tamas Blummer is questioning the validity of considering "replace-by-fee" as fraudulent. He argues that while some may see it as fraudulent, others may view it differently. The fact that a transaction has been replaced only indicates that the signer is fraudulent. Blummer suggests that nodes should ignore both outcomes to protect their reputation.
